info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 4 at 10:22PM EDT until April 9 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Northern Indiana
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana...Michigan...
Wabash River near Bluffton IN affecting Wells County.
Saint Joseph River Michigan at Three Rivers affecting St. Joseph MI, Elkhart and Branch Counties.
For the Wabash River...including Linn Grove, Bluffton IN, Wabash, Logansport...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Saint Joseph River Michigan...including Three Rivers, Mottville, Elkhart IN, South Bend, Niles...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Wabash River near Bluffton IN.
* WHEN...From Saturday afternoon to Wednesday afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, River Road at Bluffton begins to flood. Flood waters isolate the amphitheater at Kehoe Park in Bluffton.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 PM EDT Friday the stage was 7.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to 10.3 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall early Sunday afternoon. It will rise to 11.0 feet early Monday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes.
The next statement will be issued Saturday afternoon at 430 PM EDT.
